briefdescription.para: Configure a serial port's baud rate.

detaileddescription.para: USART is enabled in single buffer transmission mode, multibuffer receiver mode, 8n1.
Serial port must have a baud rate configured to work properly.

briefdescription.para: Call a function on each USART.

parameterdescription.para: Maximum number of bytes to transmit

briefdescription.para: Transmit an unsigned integer to the specified serial port in decimal format.

detaileddescription.para: This function blocks until the integer's digits have been completely transmitted.
